metadata.title: CVE-2011-4919 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
mpack 1.6 has information disclosure via eavesdropping on mails sent byother users

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mpack - 1.6-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpack package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6-8').
